entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
